name: Sudoku TV
description:
Beat those commercial breaks and give your brain some exercise with this big-screen version of the classic number puzzler. Sudoku, a logic game that's become a worldwide sensation, starts with a 9x9 grid partially filled in with numbers. Your job is to figure out which numbers complete the board by using a few simple rules:

• Each row and column must contain the numbers 1-9 without repeating
• Each of the 3x3 squares within the grid must also contain the numbers 1-9 without repeating

Sudoku TV features an unlimited number of puzzles, three difficulty levels, and the ability to add pencil marks. Puzzles are generated live but fully tested to ensure that they only have one valid solution, so you won't get stuck with unsolvable or broken games. And, best of all, you can work through puzzles with the whole family or a group of friends from the comfort of your couch!

› New in Sudoku TV 1.2 with tvOS 11, entering in numbers is even easier: use Scribble mode to draw the number on your Siri remote's trackpad, and Sudoku TV uses the power of machine learning to turn your motions into digits.
